action.des: Pitcher Change: Kiko Calero replaces Carlos Martinez, batting 1st, replacing center fielder Cameron Maybin.
Defensive Substitution: Brett Carroll replaces pitcher Carlos Martinez, batting 3rd, playing center field.

atbat.des: Brendan Ryan grounds out, second baseman Osvaldo Martinez to first baseman Jorge Cantu.
Yadier Molina flies out to center fielder Brett Carroll.

action.des: Defensive switch from right field to center field for Colby Rasmus.
Defensive Substitution: Daryl Jones replaces catcher Yadier Molina, batting 6th, playing right field.
Pitcher Change: Josh Kinney replaces Todd Wellemeyer, batting 4th, replacing center fielder Rick Ankiel.
Defensive Substitution: Jason LaRue replaces pitcher Todd Wellemeyer, batting 8th, playing catcher.

atbat.des: Brett Carroll flies out to center fielder Colby Rasmus.
Jorge Cantu grounds out, shortstop Brendan Ryan to first baseman David Freese.
Jeremy Hermida lines out to center fielder Colby Rasmus.
